title: What else matters?
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Department of the Attorney-General, partner

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Life change events
abstract: 'I don't think we had enough time to get scared, but I do remember thinking that we had too many glass windows around our house...'
description: Maree Somerville acknowledges that, despite the devastation, the day could've had a different ending - one more tragic. For Somerville, it has been an opportunity to recognise what really matters in life. On the 3rd of June 2010, the residents of Lennox Head, on the North Coast of New South Wales, were preparing for the day ahead when their town was struck by a tornado.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002419; Living with disaster 2 : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2010
